A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: For the most part good. I had high expectations going in and it met them. There were a couple scenes I didn't like including one scene that is in contention for worst scene in any star wars movie\, maybe even worse than that live scene in episode 2. Questions were left unanswered and certain characters were left too undeveloped. But in the end\, it was well done\, not over cutesy\, and action packed.
